Package snake

Class Snake

java.lang.Object
snake.Snake
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
A snake game class.
Author:
Tsvetomir, Stefan

  • Constructor Details

    • Snake

      public Snake​(int height, int width, int startX, int startY, int voxel_size, int startLength)
      Constructor for the snake game
      Parameters:
      height - - height of the game boundary
      width - - width of the game boundary
      startX - - start X position of the snake's tail
      startY - - start Y position of the snake's tail
      voxel_size - - the size of each voxel of the game boundary
      startLength - - the initial length of the snake

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw()
      Draws the snake to the canvas. Note that the method Component.repaint() must be called for the changes to take effect.

    • move

      public boolean move()
      Moves the snake forward. If food shall be eaten, the score is incremented, the food is moved via moveFood() and the updateScoreLabel() is called. If the snake goes out of bounds or intersepts itself, it dies and gameOver() is called.

    • updateScoreLabel

      public void updateScoreLabel()
      Updates the score label.

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the snake game. The snake will move once every 500ms.
